00001 using System;
00002 using System.Collections.Generic;
00003 using System.Collections;
00004 using System.Text;
00005 using System.Reflection;
00006 using System.Diagnostics;
00007 
00008 namespace Crossfade
00009 {
00010         public class ObjectComparer<ComparableObject> : IComparer<ComparableObject>
00011         {
00012                 #region Constructor
00013                 public ObjectComparer()
00014                 {
00015                 }
00016 
00017                 public ObjectComparer(string p_propertyName)
00018                 {
00019                         //We must have a property name for this comparer to work
00020                         this.PropertyName = p_propertyName;
00021                 }
00022 
00023                 public ObjectComparer(string p_propertyName, bool p_MultiColumn)
00024                 {
00025                         //We must have a property name for this comparer to work
00026                         this.PropertyName = p_propertyName;
00027                         this.MultiColumn = p_MultiColumn;
00028                 }
00029                 #endregion
00030 
00031                 #region Property
00032                 private bool _MultiColumn;
00033                 private string _propertyName;
00034 
00035                 public bool MultiColumn
00036                 {
00037                         get
00038                         {
00039                                 return _MultiColumn;
00040                         }
00041                         set
00042                         {
00043                                 _MultiColumn = value;
00044                         }
00045                 }
00046 
00047                 public string PropertyName
00048                 {
00049                         get
00050                         {
00051                                 return _propertyName;
00052                         }
00053                         set
00054                         {
00055                                 _propertyName = value;
00056                         }
00057                 }
00058                 #endregion
00059 
00060                 #region IComparer<ComparableObject> Members
00070                 public int Compare(ComparableObject x, ComparableObject y)
00071                 {
00072                         Type t = x.GetType();
00073 
00074                         if (_MultiColumn) // Multi Column Sorting
00075                         {
00076                                 string[] sortExpressions = _propertyName.Trim().Split(',');
00077 
00078                                 for (int i = 0; i < sortExpressions.Length; i++)
00079                                 {
00080                                         string fieldName, direction = "ASC";
00081 
00082                                         if (sortExpressions[i].Trim().EndsWith(" DESC"))
00083                                         {
00084                                                 fieldName = sortExpressions[i].Replace(" DESC", "").Trim();
00085                                                 direction = "DESC";
00086                                         }
00087                                         else
00088                                         {
00089                                                 fieldName = sortExpressions[i].Replace(" ASC", "").Trim();
00090                                         }
00091 
00092                                         //Get property by name
00093                                         PropertyInfo val = t.GetProperty(fieldName);
00094                                         if (val != null)
00095                                         {
00096 
00097                                                 //Compare values, using IComparable interface of the property's type
00098                                                 int iResult = Comparer.DefaultInvariant.Compare(val.GetValue(x, null), val.GetValue(y, null));
00099                                                 if (iResult != 0)
00100                                                 {
00101                                                         //Return if not equal
00102                                                         if (direction == "DESC")
00103                                                         {
00104                                                                 //Invert order
00105                                                                 return -iResult;
00106                                                         }
00107                                                         else
00108                                                         {
00109                                                                 return iResult;
00110                                                         }
00111                                                 }
00112                                         }
00113                                         else
00114                                         {
00115                                                 throw new ArgumentException(fieldName + " is not a valid property to sort on.  It doesn't exist in the Class.");
00116                                         }
00117                                 }
00118                                 //Objects have the same sort order
00119                                 return 0;
00120                         }
00121                         else
00122                         {
00123                                 PropertyInfo val = t.GetProperty(this.PropertyName);
00124                                 if (val != null)
00125                                 {
00126                                         return Comparer.DefaultInvariant.Compare(val.GetValue(x, null), val.GetValue(y, null));
00127                                 }
00128                                 else
00129                                 {
00130                                         throw new ArgumentException(this.PropertyName + " is not a valid property to sort on.  It doesn't exist in the Class.");
00131                                 }
00132                         }
00133                 }
00134                 #endregion
00135         }
00136 }
